• Women with anaemia, obesity and pre-existing medical conditions should be managed appropriately (refer to

trition during labour and delivery (Intrapartum period) 
• During the first stage of labour, intake of oral fluids and food is recommended and should be encouraged for
women, with respect for the women’s wishes.
• During active pushing in the second stage of labour, intake of oral fluids should be encouraged.
